attributes.action: Change power stations from being coal/gas powered to using more renewable energy sources like wind/water/solar power.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You might just be sitting there thinking "What a load of rubbish renewables is" , but the time to act is NOW - Dont leave it till later or it will be too late. If we havent changed gas/coal fired power stations to more renewable energy sources like wind/solar/water soon, what will we do when all these non-renewable energy supplies run out? Want to take action? Please sign the petition now!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
